name: Blobz!
description:
Drag to move the hole and guide your blobz through the many different traps! Can you get your blobz back safely? Enough blobz need to make it back to knock down the wall at the end of every level, or it’s game over!

Blobz! Features:
-Simple and satisfying controls!
-Lots of levels to beat!
-No IAP – Blobz! is a full game from the moment you download it!
